full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,SNYING PO DON GSUM GYI KHRID 'PHAGS PA SPYAN RAS GZIGS LA BRTEN PA SHIN TU LEGS PA ZHIG BZHUGS SO, ,
